content.text:
# Pulau Tawar (state constituency)

Pulau Tawar is a state constituency in Pahang, Malaysia, that is represented in the Pahang State Legislative Assembly.|label1=Malay|value1=98.33|color1=green|label4=Chinese|value4=0.09|color4=red|label3=Indian|value3=0.62|color3=orange|label2=Other ethnicities|value2=0.96|color2=yellow}}
History
Polling districts
According to the federal gazette issued on 31 October 2022, the Pulau Tawar constituency is divided into 17 polling districts.
